SELECT idEvento as idEvento FROM SERVICIO_EVENTO WHERE idEvento = #idEvento# AND idServicio = #idServicio# AND idSalon = #idSalon# AND fechaInicio = #fechaInicio#

sqlMap.select: SELECT SE.idEvento as idEvento, SE.idServicio as idServicio, SE.idSalon as idSalon, SE.cantidad as cantidad, SE.horaInicio as horaInicio, SE.horaFin as horaFin, SE.notaEspecial as notaEspecial, SE.nuevoCosto as nuevoCosto, SE.nuevoNombre as nuevoNombre, SE.nuevaDescripcion as nuevaDescripcion, SE.fechaInicio as fechaInicio, SE.fechaFin as fechaFin FROM SERVICIO_EVENTO SE, SERVICIO S, EVENTO_SALA E WHERE SE.idServicio = S.id AND SE.idEvento = E.idEvento AND SE.idSalon = E.idSalon AND SE.idEvento = #idEvento#
